title: The Witch of Endor: Vampires
description: Evil vs. Evil. A renegade vampire who can somehow walk by day seeks to destroy the other vampires so that he can rule over mortals as a god. Recruiting werewolves he hunts his own kind. Lamech the first vampire was cursed for killing Cain. His wife, Lilith is the witch of Endor who controls magic and who can speak with the dead. Only they have the power to challenge Maldivar before it is too late.
author: Robert Kenneth Wheeler Jr.
